question: Which were the participants of the final match of the Second Cricket World Cup of 1979?
explanation: West Indies and England were the participants of the final match of the Second Cricket World Cup of 1979. The 1979 Cricket World Cup (officially called the Prudential Cup '79) was the second edition of the Cricket World Cup. Organised by the International Cricket Conference, it was held in England from 9 to 23 June 1979.
